CameraInfo
struct
CameraInfo

Contains information about a camera available on the system.  This structure is returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices.

Members
name

friendly name for the device

symlink

Symbolic link name for the device. This is passed to CreateWebCamera.

info

defines the media type returned by the camera

resolutions

list of supported resolutions

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;
